github.copilot.chat.commitMessageGenerat.text: Write the subject in imperative mood, professional, no trailing period, under 50 characters.
Body lines must not be longer than 100 characters.
Allowed types: feat, fix, docs, style, refactor, perf, test, chore, ci.
Include a scope ONLY when it is obvious (e.g., api, ui, auth). Never invent a scope.
If a scope is used, restrict it to: front.
Reference issues with # ONLY if the context (branch name or diff) mentions them. Never invent a number.
If the branch follows 'issue-123-...' (or similar), reference #123 in the BODY ONLY, never in the subject.
ALWAYS base the message on the CURRENT diff and the branch name, nothing else.
After the subject, add a blank line, then an optional short body explaining the WHY.
Use a footer for BREAKING CHANGE and for formal issue linking (e.g., Closes #123).
